tasks.title: Fix ProductSeries/SeriesMetadata type error in app/storage-solutions/[seriesId]/collections/page.tsx and coverImage mapping in app/storage-solutions/[seriesId]/page.tsx
tasks.description: Resolved TS2322 by mapping ProductSeries to SeriesMetadata using a DRY mapping function in collections/page.tsx, and defensively mapping ProductImage to ImageAsset in page.tsx. All code is DRY, modular, and production-ready. Documented in architecture.md and memory.md.

tasks.title: Fix TS2345 ProductType errors in ProductPageLayout and racking-systems page.
tasks.description: Resolved TS2345 by casting category to ProductType before passing to navigation helpers in ProductPageLayout. Updated racking-systems page to ensure all series data conforms to ProductSeries. All code is DRY, modular, and production-ready. Documented in architecture.md and memory.md.

tasks.task: Remove all mock data and references from products API. Use only canonical, production-ready data and types. Update all types to use ExtendedProductData. Fix type for getProductDetails to cast categorySlug to ProductCategory for product-service compatibility.

tasks.description: Supreme Executive Chair migrated to canonical ExtendedProductData structure in its own folder. Updated executive-series index.ts and documentation. Marked legacy file as migrated.
